crop_insurance.1: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY) - Crop insurance scheme covering yield losses due to natural calamities, pests, and diseases. Premium: 2% for Kharif, 1.5% for Rabi crops
crop_insurance.2: Weather Based Crop Insurance Scheme (WBCIS) - Insurance against adverse weather conditions affecting crop yield
crop_insurance.3: Restructured Weather Based Crop Insurance Scheme - Coverage for rainfall, temperature, humidity affecting crops

minimum_support_price.4: MSP for Agricultural Produce - Government guaranteed minimum price for 23 crops including paddy, wheat, pulses, oilseeds
minimum_support_price.5: Price Support Scheme - Government procurement at MSP to protect farmers from price crashes
minimum_support_price.6: Market Intervention Scheme - Government intervention when market prices fall below economic levels

debt_relief.7: Agricultural Debt Waiver and Debt Relief Scheme - Relief for small and marginal farmers from institutional credit
debt_relief.8: Interest Subvention Scheme - Short-term crop loans up to Rs.3 lakh at subsidized 7% interest rate
debt_relief.9: Kisan Credit Card (KCC) - Easy credit access for farmers for crop production and allied activities

compensation_for_losses.10: Compensation for crop loss due to natural calamities - State Disaster Response Fund (SDRF) and National Disaster Response Fund (NDRF) provisions
compensation_for_losses.11: Compensation for crop damage by wild animals - State government schemes for wildlife damage compensation
compensation_for_losses.12: Compensation for land acquisition - Right to Fair Compensation and Transparency in Land Acquisition Act, 2013 - 4 times market value for rural land

market_protection.13: Agricultural Produce Market Committee (APMC) Act - Regulated markets for fair price discovery and farmer protection
market_protection.14: Essential Commodities Act provisions - Prevention of hoarding and black marketing of agricultural produce
market_protection.15: Contract Farming Act - Legal framework for contract farming with price assurance and dispute resolution

input_subsidies.16: Fertilizer subsidy - Subsidized fertilizers (urea, DAP, MOP) to reduce input costs
input_subsidies.17: Seed subsidy - Quality seeds at subsidized rates through government agencies
input_subsidies.18: Power subsidy - Subsidized or free electricity for agricultural operations and irrigation

income_support.19: PM-KISAN Scheme - Direct income support of Rs.6,000 per year to all farmer families in three installments
income_support.20: State-specific income support schemes - Additional income support by various state governments

legal_remedies.21: Civil suit for recovery of dues - Farmers can file civil suits for non-payment by buyers/traders
legal_remedies.22: Criminal complaint for cheating - Section 420 IPC applicable for fraud in agricultural transactions
legal_remedies.23: Consumer court remedies - Farmers can approach consumer forums for defective seeds, fertilizers, equipment
legal_remedies.24: APMC dispute resolution - Grievance redressal mechanism in regulated markets
legal_remedies.25: Revenue court remedies - Land disputes and agricultural matters under revenue jurisdiction

disaster_relief.26: Immediate relief for crop loss - Ex-gratia payment for complete crop loss due to natural disasters
disaster_relief.27: Input subsidy for replanting - Financial assistance for purchasing seeds and inputs after crop failure
disaster_relief.28: Livestock loss compensation - Compensation for loss of cattle and livestock in disasters

tenant_farmer_rights.29: Tenant farmer recognition - Legal recognition and protection for tenant farmers and sharecroppers
tenant_farmer_rights.30: Access to institutional credit - Tenant farmers eligible for crop loans with landowner consent
tenant_farmer_rights.31: Insurance coverage for tenants - Crop insurance available for tenant farmers

procedural_rights.32: Right to information on MSP - Farmers entitled to know MSP rates and procurement centers
procedural_rights.33: Right to quality testing - Free soil testing and seed quality testing facilities
procedural_rights.34: Right to timely payment - Payment within 3 days for produce sold in APMC mandis
procedural_rights.35: Right to appeal - Appeal mechanism against APMC decisions and market disputes
